metadata.title: CVE-2017-5835 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
libplist allows attackers to cause a denial of service (large memoryallocation and crash) via vectors involving an offset size of zero.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5835` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libplist++3v5 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist-utils - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist3 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
python-plist - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libplist package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3').
